tool_description: games details for multiple platform/store include are steam, playstore, epic, itch, appstore, xbox, playstation and many more.
name: All-In-One ( all in one )
title: All-In-One ( all in one )

api_list.name: get screenshots
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://all-in-one-all-in-one.p.rapidapi.com/screenshots/3498"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "all-in-one-all-in-one.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://all-in-one-all-in-one.p.rapidapi.com/screenshots/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "all-in-one-all-in-one.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
